question: What is the theme of the 2018 World Food Day (WFD)?
option3: Break the Cycle of Rural Poverty
explanation: The World Food Day (WFD) is observed every year across the world on 16th of October  to commemorate the founding of the Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO) in 1945. The theme for WFD 2018 is \"Our Actions Are Our Future ! A #ZeroHunger World by 2030 is possible”. Zero hunger means working together to ensure everyone, everywhere, has access to the safe, healthy and nutritious food they need. To achieve it, we must adopt a more sustainable lifestyle, work with others, share our knowledge and be willing to help change the world – for the better.
